cyclone.name: CINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 305 mi south of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then turning north-northwest and northwest toward the central Louisiana coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Louisiana coast (near Intracoastal City/Morgan City area)
